tutorial.tutorial_title: time series classification and extrinsic regression
tutorial.sub_topic_presented: dictionary based methods for time series classification

invited.topic: Deep Learning for Time Series Analysis
invited.content: The purpose of my visit to Dr. Patrick Schäfer's workplace was to give a talk on Deep Learning for Time Series Analysis, especially in the field of Classification and what I contributed in this field to evolve it ever since InceptionTime got published in 2020. These contributions consist on both the hand-crafted convolution filters that produced H-InceptionTime and the efficient deep learning model LITETime.

During my visit to Prof. Geoff Webb's at the Monash University, I got the opportunity to meet all his research group and we discussed on many topics while I presented my PhD thesis work as well as my colleagues' work. During my stay we worked on a paper for Time Series Averaging and evaluated it usnig Clustering. The paper titled "ShapeDBA: Generating Effective Time Series Prototypes using ShapeDTW Barycenter Averaging" got then accepted at the AALTD workshop of the ECML/PKDD conference in 2023.

visitors.topic: Deep Learning from SITS for Predicting Live Fuel Moisture Content
visitors.content: PhD candidate Lynn Miller presented her work about Deep Learning for Live Fuel Moisture Content Estimation. I had the chance to present for her my work published work during my PhD at IRIMAS UHA and got some great feedback. We discussed about the usage of Custom Filters in other applications.

visitors.topic: Unsupervised Cross-Region Adaptation by Temporal Shift Estimation
visitors.content: Dr. Charlotte Pelletier did a seminar about her team's work around Unsupervised Learning for Remote Sensing. I had the opportunity to present for her and discuss my work during my first couple of months since the start of my PhD at IRIMAS, UHA.
Prof. Geoff Webb did a seminar about his team's work around Time Series Classification. I had the chance to present for him and discuss my work during my Master's Internship at IRIMAS, UHA.
